CPS310.problems: I felt that the exams did not reflect the content we were taught.
Assignments took way too long to complete.
I had a lot of trouble with learning recursion cases as a beginner

CPS342.problems: I did not feel like I had enough time to finish exams.

CPS415.problems: I did not feel like the quizzes and assignments prepped me exams

EGC220.problems: It is a very class to go in without proper base knowledge about boolean logic. I do not recommend taking this course unless you have taken a discrete mathematics course or an assembly course.
It was hard to learn anything without prior knowledge of boolean logic
Everything. Very difficult class if you do not know a good bit  about circuitry beforehand

EGC221.problems: You learn a lot of things on your own in this class and have to rely a lot on web documentation to understand things like wiring breadboards and such.

CPS210.problems: I did not feel like I had an easy time in this course as a beginner to computer structures as a whole.

CPS353.problems: I found that I would have had an easier time taking this class if I had more time developing my skills with higher level concepts
